title: American Museum of Natural History | New York City
description: Explore the natural world, and the known universe. All admission to the Museum is by timed entry and must be reserved online. Open daily, 10 am-5:30 pm.
cleaned_text: The [Gilder Center](/exhibitions/permanent/gilder-center) is now open! Experience the beauty of [Invisible Worlds](/exhibitions/invisible-worlds). Mingle with more than 1,000 [butterflies](/exhibitions/butterflies). Ask yourself, [What's in a Name](/exhibitions/whats-in-a-name)? [Explore More](/explore) [Giant-Screen Film Blue Whales: Return of the Giants Explore the world of the largest animals on Earth—the magnificent blue whale.](/exhibitions/giant-screen-film) [Permanent Hall Susan and Peter J. Solomon Family Insectarium Discover more about insects, the most diverse group of animals on Earth—and why they're critical to our planet.](/exhibitions/permanent/gilder-center/insectarium) Become a Member - Unlimited General Admission - Free tickets to ticketed exhibitions and exclusive Member previews - Access to a Member entrance
